title: Fix typos widely spread around codebase
description:
The typos below that are widely spread around the codebase, mostly on comments plus one occurrence in the documentation and another one in a test name.

'equivilent' instead of 'equivalent'

'respones' instead of 'responses'

'the the' instead of 'to the'
